text: Michael S. Stuhlbarg (born July 5, 1968), is an American theatre, movie and television actor. His most important movie roles are "Larry Gopnik" in A Serious Man (2009), and "Griffin" in Men in Black 3 (2012). Stuhlbarg is Jewish. He recently appeared as "Dr. Robert Hoffstetler/Dimitri Mosenkov" in The Shape of Water (2017). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from Long Beach, California
title: Michael Stuhlbarg
